title: Rusty Coder: REST APIs in Python with Flask and requests
slug: This DevNet Learning Lab helps rusty coders create REST APIs for their Python programs using Flask and make REST API calls from their Python programs using requests.

files.title: Step 1: Install the Python **Flask** and **requests** packages
Step 2: Make a web server/web service for your Python program using Flask
Step 3: Create a REST API service for your Python program using Flask
Step 4: Run our new web service and call our new REST API with Postman
Step 5: Call a REST API from your Python program using requests

related.title: Hello World for the Rusty Coder: Get Started
